game.name: EG Fast Driver
game.description:
Are you a true car race lover? If yes, join EG Fast Driver right away and allow yourself to be a part of the biggest car race completion you have ever participated. The exclusive gameplay, neat and clean graphics and easy controls are sure to keep you engrossed for hours. If you do not believe our words, give it a try and learn what kind of fun and thrill this free online car game can offer to you. We are pretty sure that you will surely fall in love with this game and invite your friends and families to explore it. 
In this casual game, driving a car is not easy as various other cars will also be there on the track to restrict you from moving forward. Your objective is to drive safely and cover as much distance as you can to crate the highest score in your group. Try not to crush with other vehicles and obstacles that you see on the tracks! Remember, you will have only three lives in this brand new racing game. You will lose if your vehicle is collided with other vehicles three times. 
Confusion will become bigger with the increasing speed of the game further. The key of winning this addictive and adventure game is to put your driving and focus skills to test. This exclusively-designed car game has lots of interesting and thrilling moments to offer during the gameplay. It is suitable for players of all ages and can help players to improve their car driving talents. Give this game at least a single chance to know why players from all across the world love playing it to kill their tiresome hours!
